notes: Does not directly amplify damage as it is dealt, but rather saves all damage values and deals 30% of it 5 seconds after cast. This means that the damage can be avoided by becoming spell immune, invulnerable, or hidden at the end of the duration.

The damage is applied as soon as the debuff expires. However, dispelling the debuff skips the damage entirely. Recasting Soul Rend on the same target refreshes the duration. Doing this delays the damage further, and gives more time to deal damage to the target. The damage is credited to the last caster of Soul Rend on the target.

Only considers the 3 damage types (after all reductions), but not HP Removal effects (e.g. Sunder, Soul Ring etc.).
Attacks against the affected target have absolute accuracy, which prevents its attacks from being missed (i.e. evasion or blind effects).

The critical strike applies to all attacks against the debuffed enemy, including buildings, wards, and allies of the target. If the attacking unit is ranged, already launched attacks do not crit if the target gets debuffed before projectile impact. Vice versa, already launched attacks do crit if the debuff expires before the projectiles land. If another source of critical strike procs on the same attack, the higher multiplier has priority.

abilities.description: Silences a target for 5 seconds. At the end of the silence, an additional 30% of all damage taken during the silence will be dealt to the target as magical damage. All attacks on the silenced target will have True Strike and 100% chance to crit for 130% damage.

notes: Successive attacks on the same target do not stack the debuff, but refresh the duration instead. Uses the same modifier as Mage Slayer, so they do not stack with each other either.
